2) Shifts in female PhD recipients by field (1985, 2000, and 2015). Describe if and how there was
a shift in PhDs awarded to females in four fields (Physical and Earth Sciences, Engineering, Education, and Humanities & Arts) in 1985, 2000, and 2015. Describe your results statistically, in a graph or table, and in text. Note: There are several ways that you can interpret this question. You are invited to decide which you think is/are most interesting. Just be really clear about what you are asking/answering in your report.
